body:
Help!
I need stuff for my YouTube channel!
1. Channel Art!
2. An Intro!
If anyone could make me some channel art
saying "TheDiamondPorkchop,"l please tell me!
Also, I need an awesome intro!!!
Anybody please xD
body_tagged:
Help!
I need stuff for my YouTube channel!
1. Channel Art!
2. An Intro!
If anyone could make me some channel art
saying "TheDiamondPorkchop,"l please tell me!
Also, I need an awesome intro!!!
Anybody please xD
title: For my Channel....

replies.body:
Here's that intro you asked me for in game. I have to go to an amusement park now(:D) so here's the link: http://www.mediafire.com/download/5xlv8ax7ykq0x78/diamondporkchop3.mp4

Make sure you don't give me credit, give GoldSolace credit instead.

replies.body:
That intro is overused a lot, so I added different effects to make it stand out a little bit more, like: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WGBeJpRzClE
You could do that too, all you really need is a simple editing software like  Movie Maker.
